ModMetaData.name: Golf Club
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description:
The game of golf is very popular on the glitterworlds, though not so much on the rimworlds where many players found themselves stranded after their escape pods crashed.

Naturally, it didn't take long for these survivors to start using their clubs as weapons, though they are still managing to play the game itself.

INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING:

- Golf club (melee)
- Golf club (ranged)
- Putting hole
